body.description: Practical and stylish, the Notre Dame Nightstand has 4 built-in USB ports so you can charge your devices using only a single wall outlet without additional adapters. Perfect for anyone with multiple electronics that use USB charging. Open shelf and one drawer provide ample space to store or decorate. Tech-friendly features with classic style that's made of solid wood for a timeless addition to your home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Relax and Furniture For over 40 years, Casual Home has created furniture with consumer-centric design and lasting materials for families and homes of all sizes to foster community and achieve a more casual tomorrow. Sustainably Sourced Solid Wood Factory Direct Smart Functions Casual Home Night Stand with USB Port 3 Style, 3 Colors Available Regal yet simple, the Casual Home Nightstands have 4 built-in USB ports so you can charge your devices using only a single wall outlet without additional adapters. Open lower shelf and drawer provide ample space to store or decorate. Perfect for anyone with multiple electronics that use USB charging. Made of solid wood for a timeless addition to your home. 4-USB charging ports built-in for convenient device charging. Spacious open lower shelf space increases your storage capability. Convenient drawer provides space to keep your essentials. Rich finish accentuates any style of home décor for peace of mind. Solid wood construction for increased durability and longevity. Light and easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This product looks good, and is well made. The assembly was very easy, and the allen wrench needed was provided. Its very sturdy and worth the money at this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is not a beautiful piece of furniture, but for the price I think we all understand that going in. So yes, it has that pre-made feel to it and it's made of veneer panels but it's solidly constructed and requires very little effort to assemble. The dark color looks nice and it's on the bigger side for an end table...makes a great nightstand in a kids room because of the nice added feature of the built in outlets. It has USB and regular outlet slots hidden under a black plastic insert on the top. Simply plug in the included AC power chord and these outlets are functional. I like that the power chord plugs into the table as well so if you don't want to use the outlets feature right away you don't have to have the chord plugged into the table. My son is currently too young to need the outlets feature but it will be nice to have in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t see a review for this item, but I bought it anyway. I was hesitant, but I am more than happy with the way it turned out. It was easy to assemble, the parts came in tact, the shipping was fast, and the USB ports work!! However, the wood is cheap and there was a SLIGHT mark on the dresser. It was a little more pricey than the quality, however, the USB ports make up for it. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It didn't take long at all to assemble. It's not the sturdiest table around but a nightstand doesn't need to be that sturdy. I like the color and that it has a drawer. I would consider it to be a few steps above IKEA. At least it's not particleboard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought two. And they blend very well in my bedroom. I really like that it comes with 4 usb ports which comes in handy. My only issues are that it came with a few dings & knicks on it, luckily not very visible. The blue power light is way too bright, but plugging in a usb cable in the middle port shields it some, and so does my jewelry box. Lastly, one of orders was missing a 2nd screw needed to secure the drawer handle. I had to improvise, but I made it work. It is still a good night table and the best one I’ve had so far, style wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The drawer is super shallow but it works well enough
reviews.reviewText: The drawer is super shallow but it works well enough. Have to lay bottle on their side.Love the color and the sturdiness. It’s definately large. Also tall enough! Perfect height for my king size bed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cracked, Scratched, and Gouged
reviews.reviewText: The package I received had had some bad handling in its lifetime, and the furniture pieces out of the box showed several pieces with cosmetic damage. I wouldn't have purchased this if I had known the condition, but repackaging and hauling back to have it returned seemed like more hassle than it's worth. The product pictures of this nightstand indicated a resemblance to a style of dressers from a now discontinued line of furniture from World Market, and that much at least gives it some value for me. I decided to try to correct the dings and blemishes and put the unit together. I assumed correctly that this is budget furniture. It feels flimsy after assembly and the symmetry is off where the top piece aligns with the supporting legs. The USB ports are a nice touch, but if you flip the switch to turn on the power, a bright blue LED light turns on. Not something I will be using in a dark bedroom at night. I'm leaning toward keeping the nightstand, though I would not recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look Great but Required a Little Extra Work
reviews.reviewText: These look great and am very please with the purchase. We ordered two nightstands and both had an issue with assembly of the same piece. The threaded fasteners in the back panel (E) were not aligned with the screw holes the the table top (A). They were both off by 0.5" so it just required widening the hole a bit and then everything was great. Since it was the same defect in both tables I would say there is a manufacturing issue but aside from that these are great looking bedside tables. The four USB ports on each table is more than enough to connect all the chargers you need!
